hero.subtitle: Honoring Those Who Watch Over Our Souls

15h30.title: Recognition Ceremony
15h30.desc: Honoring pastors for their faithful service

founder.name: Pastor Patrick
founder.title: Founder of IPD
founder.quote: Honoring pastors is honoring God's heart for His people.
founder.bio: Pastor Patrick is a servant of God passionate about honoring and supporting spiritual leaders. His vision for International Pastors Day was born from a deep desire to see pastors encouraged and celebrated for their sacrificial service.

page.subtitle: Founder and Visionary of International Pastors Day

calling.title: The Divine Calling
calling.text: In 2008, God placed in Pastor Patrick's heart a clear vision: to create a unique moment to honor and encourage pastors worldwide. This vision became International Pastors Day, a movement that now touches thousands of God's servants.

timeline.2008: Received the divine vision to honor pastors
timeline.2015: First edition of International Pastors Day in Yaoundé
timeline.2025: Celebrating the 10th edition with over 500 pastors expected

message.title: Founder's Message
message.text: Dear pastors, you are the shepherds God has chosen to watch over His flock. Your service, sacrifice, and faithfulness deserve to be honored. International Pastors Day is our way of saying thank you and encouraging you to continue your noble mission.

hero.title: Our Vision
hero.subtitle: Honoring, Encouraging, and Equipping Pastors Worldwide

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.text: To create a unique moment of recognition and encouragement for all pastors, celebrating their faithful service and equipping them for an even more impactful ministry.

excellence.title: Excellence
excellence.text: We strive for excellence in everything we do to worthily honor God's servants.

unity.title: Unity
unity.text: We bring pastors together across denominations to celebrate our common faith.

impact.title: Impact
impact.text: We create lasting impact in the lives of pastors and their communities.

honor.title: Honor
honor.text: We honor those who watch over our souls with respect and gratitude.

impact.title: Our Impact
impact.text: Since 2015, International Pastors Day has touched thousands of lives and continues to grow each year.

why.title: Why Give?
why.text: Your donations allow us to organize this exceptional event, cover logistical costs, and bless participating pastors. Every contribution, regardless of size, makes a difference.

impact.title: Your Impact
impact.text: Thanks to your support, we can continue to honor and encourage pastors who serve faithfully in their communities. Thank you for your generosity!
